entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
